page.title: 19TWO DAYS IN FIRST YEAR
page.content: 7.00 A.M.-Get up,have bath. 7.30 Breakfast(cornflakes and T.V. A.M.) 8.40 Mum drives me to school-Maths, French,Classical Background,English, Library,Home Economics.3.35 P.M.-Go home.4.30-Homework.5.30-Tea and T.V. and washing up. 6.00-Out to play with friends (Football,tig etc..9.00- 9.30 --Ready for bed.{SUNDAY:-}9.15 A.M. Get up,have brown toast and milk.10.30-Watch cartoon and get sunbed out of the shed and sit in back garden reading.11.00-Cheese sandwiches and apple juice.2.00 P.M. Watched Eastenders Omnibus.4.35-Went to Crawford to picnic beside the river.We took our Gran with us and I played with little brother.9.05 home and bed. {*CREDITS*}S.BARCLAY,K.GILLIES, H.JACKSON A.JOHNSTON,J.LENNOX,K.MCCUAI G,A.MERCER,T.MULDOON,L.MURRAY,G.PHILLI P,ON,C.SPENCE,L.THOMSON,S.DAVIES SEE20
